title: Can't redeem Veteran Omega Squad Icon
body:
https://image.ibb.co/fFBdwa/image.png

I already tried restarting the launcher but the error keeps popping up and I don't get the icon, what can I do?

replies.body:
When I close that window I get this screen but the icon is not added to my list
https://image.ibb.co/nKuqba/image.png
I have the same issue.  Unlocked this icon but when I go to look for it, nothing is in my inventory.
So to better understand, it says you unlocked it even though it remains in your inventory?  If you check your icons inventory, is it there at all?  You might need to scroll down a bit to find it!
I literally cannot craft anything. Not champions, icons, skins, not one thing. Everything gives the same error.

No worries, we're looking into this now!  I've got a[ sticky post up ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Z3zIAhas-8417-hextech-crafting-failed-to-redeem)and will provide updates as they come in.  Hang tight!
I am having the exact same problem (I have tried restarting the client and spamming it) it is in my loot but I cannot reedem always says failed )
Thanks for the update!  Hang tight while I try and get us some more info.

I've seen the Redemption Failed issue before.  I can forward this info over to interested parties but there may actually be a simple workaround:  **Spam Redemption**.  If you keep spamming it, it should budge through and unlock!
Bumping, because I have this exact same problem.  Restarting the client does not fix the issue.
